alert.note: Alert for Ojai Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 06 at 8:23PM PST until December 07 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 degrees will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures between 28 and 32 degrees possible. * WHERE...Ojai Valley. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM PST Wednesday. For the Freeze Watch, from late Wednesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.
